short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Browser addon to open multiple urls with one click. With many more tools to help you manage urls.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: The "Bulk URL Opener" extension is a handy tool designed to streamline web browsing by allowing users to open multiple URLs with just one click. With this extension, users can efficiently manage and navigate through various web pages simultaneously, enhancing their browsing experience and productivity.
